flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: 2 Benar, 1 Salah
source_text: 2 Truths, 1 Lie

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Fikir tiga pernyataan tentang diri anda. Dua mesti benar dan satu yang salah.
source_text: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Ianya mungkin membantu apabila memikirkan kehendak, impian, suka atau tidak suka. Contohnya, saya benci pisang, saya suka ais krim dan saya sangat berharap saya dapat menyanyi.
source_text: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, I love ice cream and I really wish I could sing.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Katakan kepada pasangan atau rakan anda. Minta mereka meneka yang mana satu bohong.
source_text: Say them to your partner or friends. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Adakah mereka meneka dengan betul? Adakah ia sesuatu yang mengejutkan?
source_text: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - 2 truths 1 lie
text: Sekarang minta mereka melakukan perkara yang sama. Adakah anda belajar sesuatu yang baru antara satu sama lain?
source_text: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Ayam Gila
source_text: Crazy Chicken

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Goyangkan tangan anda ke atas sebanyak 8 kali
source_text: Shake your hand in the air 8 times while counting

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Lakukan dengan pantas dan dengan bunyi yang sekuat mungkin
source_text: Do it as fast and loud as you can

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Ulangi dengan tangan anda yang sebelah lagi dan kedua-dua kaki anda
source_text: Repeat with your other hand and both feet

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Lakukan 7 kali, kemudian 6 kali sehingga anda mencapai 1.
source_text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times until you get to 1.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Sebut "Ayam gila" sekuat yang anda boleh!
source_text: Call out “Crazy chicken” as loud as you can!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Adakah anda telah melepaskan semua tekanan anda? Jika tidak, lakukan lagi dengan lebih pantas dan kuat!
source_text: Have you released all your stress? If not, do it again even faster and louder!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Senaman Bersama Keluarga
source_text: Family Work Out

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Pilih satu sukan atau senaman untuk dilakukan bersama
source_text: Choose a sport or exercise to do together

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Tentukan dalam satu jadual. Adakah anda akan melakukannya setiap hari? Untuk berapa lama?
source_text: Decide on a schedule. Are you going to do it every day? For how long?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Cubalah selama satu minggu.
source_text: Try it out for a week.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Family work out
text: Pada akhir minggu, tanya kepada diri anda dan keluarga anda soalan-soalan ini. Bagaimana keadaannya? Bagaimana perasaan anda pada awal minggu? Bagaimana perasaan anda pada akhir minggu ini? Apakah kelainan yang boleh kita lakukan pada minggu hadapan?
source_text: At the end of the week, ask yourself and your family these questions. How´s it going? How did you feel at the start of the week? How do you feel at the end of the week? What can we do differently next week?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Helo! Bagaimana perasaan anda? Sekiranya anda merasa sungguh sedih atau tertekan, berikut adalah aktiviti yang menyeronokkan yang juga dapat melepaskan tekanan.
source_text: Hello! How are you feeling? If you are feeling overwhelmed or stress, here's a fun activity that can also release some stress.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Berdiri dan angkat tangan anda ke atas. Tolak awan dan biarkan Perhatian Positif Sinaran Matahari menyinari anda. Regangkan kedua-dua tangan anda. Regangkan ke depan dan ke belakang.
source_text: Stand up and stretch your arms up to the sky. Push away any clouds and let the Sunshine of Positive Attention shine down on you. Stretch to both sides. Stretch to the front and to the back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Letakkan satu kaki di hadapan dan pusingkan pergelangan kaki ke kedua-dua sisi. Lakukan setiap kaki dengan empat bulatan pada setiap arah
source_text: Place one foot in front of the other and make small circles from ankles, remember to turn to both sides. Do each foot with four circles in each direction

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Sekarang goyangkan seluruh badan anda secepat yang anda boleh. Goyangkan ke atas! Goyangkan ke bawah! Goyangkan semuanya!
source_text: Now shake your whole body as fast as you can. Shake it up high! Shake it down low! Shake it all around!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Biarkan tangan anda tergantung di sisi anda. Tolak bahu ke telinga sambil anda menarik nafas, mengerutkan mata, dan tahan nafas anda. Lepaskan bahu anda sambil merehatkan badan.
source_text: Let your hand hang by your side. Squeeze your shoulders tightly up to your ears as you breathe in, scrunch your eyes, and hold your breath. Release your shoulders as you relax your body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Tutup mata dan angkat perlahan-lahan tangan anda ke atas kepala semasa anda menarik nafas. Turunkan tangan anda perlahan-lahan ke sisi sambil menarik nafas. Ulangi 4 kali.
source_text: Close your eyes and raise your arms slowly above your head as you breathe in. Lower your arms slowly to your side as you breathe out. Repeat 4 times.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Rehatkan tangan anda dan biarkannya berayun ke depan dan belakang. Tarik nafas dalam-dalam sebanyak 4 kali semasa anda melakukan ini. Ini bagus untuk punggung bawah.
source_text: Relax your arms and let them swing to the front and back. Take 4 deep breaths while you do this. This is good for your lower back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Rehatkan tangan anda dan biarkan tangan anda berayun ke samping, dan pusingkan bahagian atas badan anda. Tangan anda harus perlahan-lahan memukul belakang anda semasa anda berpusing dari sisi ke sisi.
source_text: Relax your arms and let your arms to swing sideways, and turn your upper body. Your arms should gently hit your back as you twist from side to side.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Relax
text: Ambil masa untuk mengimbas pengalaman anda. Ingat bahawa anda boleh melakukan aktiviti ini pada bila-bila masa apabila anda merasa perlu melepaskan tekanan dan memberi tenaga kepada minda dan badan anda.
source_text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need to release stress and energise your mind and body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: Berhenti & Dengar
source_text: Stop & Listen

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Berhenti untuk seketika dan tutup mata anda.
source_text: • Stop for a moment and close your eyes.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Berapa banyak bunyi yang dapat anda dengar? Dengarkan bunyi di dalam dan di luar bilik. Kira dengan jari anda. (Berhenti selama 10 saat)
source_text: • How many sounds can you hear? Listen to sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers. (Pause for 10 seconds)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Berapa banyak jari yang anda guna? Apakah bunyi yang anda dengari?
source_text: • How many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Mari cuba lagi. Bolehkah anda mendengar bunyi baru kali ini? Bolehkah anda mendengar bunyi di dalam badan anda sendiri? (Berhenti selama 10 saat)
source_text: • Let’s try again. Can you hear any new sounds this time? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body? (Pause for 10 seconds)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Active - Stop and listen
text: • Buka mata anda. Apakah bunyi baru yang anda dengar?
source_text: • Open your eyes. What new sounds did you hear?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Berhenti Seketika
source_text: A Short Pause

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Duduk dan pejamkan mata anda
source_text: Sit down and close your eyes

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Dengarkan nafas anda semasa masuk dan keluar.
source_text: Listen to your breath as it goes in and out.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Selami perasaan anda.
source_text: Notice how you feel.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Tarik nafas dalam-dalam lagi.
source_text: Take a few more deep breaths.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Apabila anda sudah bersedia buka mata anda semula. Adakah anda rasai sebarang perbezaan?
source_text: When you are ready open your eyes again. Do you feel any different?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - A short pause
text: Ingatkan diri anda bahawa "Semuanya baik saja"
source_text: Remind yourself that “Everything is ok”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Peluklah Diri Anda
source_text: Give Yourself A Hug

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Bella mama, bella mama hei.
source_text: Bella mama, bella mama hey.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Hei di sana! Bagaimana perasaan anda hari ini? Adakah anda berasa hebat?!
source_text: Hey there! How are you feeling today? Do you feel great?!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Mungkin tidak. Mungkin anda menjerit lagi pada anak anda hari ini? Mungkin anda marah dan berkata sesuatu yang anda tidak banggakan? Tidak mengapa. Ia sangat tertekan sekarang.
source_text: Maybe not. Maybe you shouted again at your children today? Maybe you got angry and said something you don't feel proud of? It’s ok. It’s super stressful right now.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Tarik nafas panjang dan fikirkan satu perkara membanggakan yang anda lakukan hari ini. Ia tidak semestinya besar. Lingkarkan tangan anda ke seluruh badan anda dan peluklah diri anda. Dan sekarang fikirkan satu perkara tidak membanggakan yang anda lakukan hari ini. Apakah perubahan yang anda boleh lakukan esok? Lingkarkan lengan anda ke seluruh badan dan peluklah diri anda.
source_text: Take a deep breath and think of one thing you did today that you do feel proud of. It doesn't have to be big. And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug. And now think of one thing you did today that you don't feel proud of. What can you do differently tomorrow? And wrap your arms around your body and give yourself a hug.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Give yourself a hug
text: Bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama hei”.
source_text: Bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama, bella mama hey”.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: Helo! Adakah anda tahu bahawa 3 adalah nombor ajaib? Tarik nafas dalam kiraan tiga dan hembus dengan kiraan tiga. Bagaimana anda rasa sekarang? Adakah anda merasai sebarang perbezaan?
source_text: Hello! Did you know that 3 is a magical number? Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three. How do you feel now? Do you feel any different?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: Apakah tiga makanan kegemaran anda? Boleh anda nyatakan tiga perkara yang dapat anda lihat sekarang? Boleh anda dengar tiga bunyi yang boleh anda dengari sekarang? Apakah tiga perkara yang anda syukuri sekarang?
source_text: What are your three favourite foods? Can you name three things you can see right now? Can you hear three sounds you can hear right now? What are three things you are grateful for right now?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Magical number
text: Tarik nafas dalam kiraan tiga dan hembus nafas dalam kiraan tiga? Bagaimana anda rasa sekarang? Adakah anda rasai sebarang perbezaan? Tiga adalah nombor ajaib!
source_text: Breathe in to the count of three and breathe out to the count of three? How do you feel now? Do you feel any different? Three is a magical number!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Melepaskan Sejumlah Tenaga
source_text: Release Some Energy

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Baba da bi da ba da baaa! Kuasa Berhenti Seketika!
source_text: Baba da bi da ba da baaa! Pause Power!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Apa Kuasa Berhenti Sejenak yang anda katakan? Ia adalah kemampuan untuk berubah daripada seorang yang perengus dan pemarah kepada seorang yang tenang dan jelas.
source_text: What’s Pause Power I hear you say? It’s the ability to transform from a grumpy, angry person into a calm, clear one.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Ketika saya berasa kecewa, saya meletakkan kaki saya dengan kuat di tanah dan saya menarik dan menghembus nafas tiga kali secara perlahan. Kadang-kadang saya membayangkan saya mencium bunga dan meniup lilin.
source_text: When I’m feeling frustrated I plant my feet firmly on the ground and I breathe in and out three times as slowly as I can. Sometimes I imagine I’m smelling a flower and blowing out a candle.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Release some energy
text: Da ta! Kuasa Berhenti Sejenak! Transformasi saya daripada pemarah kepada tenang selesai!
source_text: Da ta! Pause Power! My transformation from grumpy to calm is complete!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Menjaga diri sendiri
source_text: Taking care of yourself

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Berikut adalah aktiviti pendek yang dapat membantu apabila anda sangat perlukan lebih banyak sokongan untuk dilalui pada hari tersebut.
source_text: Here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Kenal pasti apa yang berlaku kepada anda pada masa ini. Apa yang kamu fikirkan? Adakah pemikiran anda positif atau negatif. Bagaimana perasaan anda? Adakah anda merasa selesa atau sebaliknya? Bagaimana rasa badan anda? Adakah anda merasa tegang atau tenang?
source_text: Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Selami hati anda dengan cara yang baik dan lembut. Anda mungkin mahu meletakkan satu tangan di hati atau dada anda.
source_text: Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Anda boleh mengatakan perkataan berikut secara senyap kepada diri sendiri:
source_text: You can then say the following words silently to yourself:

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Semoga saya tenteram.
source_text: May I be peaceful.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Semoga saya selamat.
source_text: May I be safe.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Semoga saya sihat.
source_text: May I be healthy.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Semoga saya gembira.
source_text: May I be happy.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Semoga ada kasih sayang dalam keluarga saya.
source_text: May there be love in my family.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Semoga saya rasa disayangi.
source_text: May I feel loved.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Adult - Calm - Taking care of yourself
text: Ambil masa untuk mengimbas pengalaman anda. Ingat bahawa anda boleh melakukan aktiviti ini pada bila-bila masa apabila anda merasakan seperti memerlukan sokongan tambahan.
source_text: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need extra support.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Memasak bersama
source_text: Cooking together

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Kanak-kanak suka lakukan apa yang anda lakukan!
source_text: Children love to do what you do!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Cooking together
text: Biarkan bayi anda bermain dengan periuk dan sudu semasa anda menyiapkan makan malam
source_text: Let your baby play with pots and spoons while you are making dinner

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Parti Tari-menari
source_text: Dance Party

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Pasang muzik kegemaran anda atau nyanyikan lagu kegemaran anda dan menari di sekitar bilik dengan anak kecil anda. Sekiranya anda mempunyai bayi, pegang mereka semasa anda menari.
source_text: Put on your favourite music or sing your favourite song and dance around the room with your toddler. If you have a baby hold them while you dance.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Menari dengan cara yang berbeza atau dengan anggota tubuh anda yang berlainan
source_text: Dance in different ways or with different parts of your body

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Sebagai contoh, "Menari seperti monyet", "Menari seperti ayam" atau "Mari menari dengan lutut dan pinggul kita"
source_text: For example, “Dance like a monkey”, “Dance like a chicken” or “Let’s dance with our knees and hips”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Fikirkan arahan yang berbeza. Bermain-mainlah dengan serius!
source_text: Think up different instructions. Be seriously playful!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Apabila muzik berhenti, semua orang membuat pembekuan lucu
source_text: When the music stops, everyone does a funny freeze

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Dance party
text: Perhatikan irama atau pergerakan yang mereka suka!
source_text: Notice what rhythms or movement they like!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Terjatuh ke dalam parit!
source_text: Down in a ditch!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Duduk di atas kerusi dan letakkan anak kecil di pangkuan yang menghadap ke arah anda. Pegang mereka di bawah lengan dengan kuat.
source_text: Sit on a chair and put your toddler on your lap facing you. Hold them firmly under the arms.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Lantunkan kaki anda dengan perlahan dan katakan dengan suara lembut "Anak kuda, anak kuda, anak kuda, anak kuda"
source_text: Gently bounce your legs and say in a soft voice “Baby horse, baby horse, baby horse, baby horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Lantunkan kaki anda lebih lagi dan katakan dengan sedikit kuat "Kuda kecil, kuda kecil, kuda kecil, kuda kecil"
source_text: Bounce your legs a bit more and say a bit louder “Little horse, little horse, little horse, little horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Lantunkan kaki anda lagi dan katakan dengan kuat "Kuda besar, kuda besar, kuda besar, kuda besar"
source_text: Bounce your legs more and say louder “Big horse, big horse, big horse, big horse”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Down in a ditch
text: Apabila anda menyeru "Jatuh ke dalam parit!" buka lutut anda dan biarkan anak anda jatuh di antara mereka. Pastikan anda memegangnya agar mereka tidak jatuh jauh!
source_text: When you call out “Down in a ditch!” open your knees and let your child drop down between them. Make sure you hold them so they don’t fall far!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Wajah lucu
source_text: Funny Faces

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Pandang pada mata bayi anda dan buat wajah lucu yang berbeza.
source_text: Look at your baby in the eyes and make different funny faces.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Buat muka besar. Buat muka kecil. Buat muka gembira. Buat muka terkejut.
source_text: Make a big face. Make a small face. Make a happy face. Make a surprised face.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Mana satu yang membuatkan bayi anda tersenyum atau ketawa? Buat lagi, kali ini lebih besar!
source_text: Which ones make your baby smile or laugh? Do them again, even bigger this time!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Bermain dengan perasaan berbeza dan tambah bunyi.
source_text: Play with different feelings and add sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Tiru mimik muka mereka. Tokok tambah untuk jadikannya lucu.
source_text: Copy their facial expressions too. Exaggerate them to make them funny.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Funny faces
text: Sentiasa akhiri dengan ekspresi positif!
source_text: Always end on a positive expression!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: Permainan Cermin
source_text: Mirror Game

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • Pergi ke paras bayi anda sehingga mereka dapat melihat dan mendengar anda.
source_text: • Get to your baby's level so they can see you and hear you.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • Tiru ekspresi muka dan suara mereka.
source_text: • Copy their facial expressions and sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Mirror game
text: • Ia sangat mudah semasa membina ikatan yang kuat antara anda dan bayi anda!
source_text: • It is so simple while creating a strong bond between you and your baby!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Jari kaki Muzikal
source_text: Musical Toes

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Baringkan bayi anda
source_text: Put your baby on their back

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Gerakkan jari kaki mereka dan katakan, "Jari kecil ini pergi [bunyi lucu]"
source_text: Wiggle their toe and say, “This little toe goes [funny sound]”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Buat bunyi lucu untuk setiap jari kaki
source_text: Make a funny sound for each toe

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Bermain dengan bunyi yang berbeza. Misalnya, bunyi haiwan, bunyi pop, suara melengking, bunyi kentut.
source_text: Play with different sounds. For example, animal sounds, popping sounds, squeaky sounds, fart sounds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Ulangi untuk semua sepuluh jari.
source_text: Repeat this for all ten toes.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Musical Toes
text: Cuba jadikan jari kaki terakhir bunyi yang paling besar dan melucukan!
source_text: Try to make the last toe the biggest and funniest sound!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Peek a boo
text: Cak!
source_text: Peek-a-Boo!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Peek a boo
text: • Tutup muka anda dengan tangan.
source_text: • Cover your face with your hands.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Peek a boo
text: • Tunjuk muka anda dengan pantas dan katakan "Cak!" atau "Helo!" Bayi menyukainya!
source_text: • Quickly show your face and say "Peek-a-Boo!" or "Hello!" Babies love it!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Lihat dan Jadi seperti itu
source_text: See It Be It

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Lihat sekeliling anda dan namakan sesuatu yang anda boleh nampak. Sebagai contoh, sebatang pokok atau sebuah cawan
source_text: Look around you and name something that you can see. For example, a tree or a cup

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Katakan kepada anak anda "Saya nampak sebatang pokok, mari jadi pokok"
source_text: Say to your child “I see a tree, let’s be it”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Mula dari kiraan 5 dan buat bentuk pokok dengan badan anda. Jadilah sebesar dan selucu mungkin.
source_text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Sekarang giliran anak anda. Apa yang dapat mereka lihat?
source_text: Now let your child have a turn. What can they see?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Sekiranya boleh, pergi keluar dan berada di alam semula jadi. Sekiranya tidak boleh, mainkan di dalam rumah.
source_text: If you can, go outside and be in nature. If you can’t, play it inside.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - See it Be it
text: Apabila anda telah melakukannya beberapa kali, tambahkan gerakan dan bunyi!
source_text: When you’ve done it a few times, add moves and sounds!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Penggoncang
source_text: Shakers

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Cari botol plastik yang kosong, bersih atau periuk dengan penutup yang ditutup rapat.
source_text: Find an empty, clean plastic bottle or pot with a lid that closes tight.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Isikannya dengan pasir, batu, beras, kacang atau apa sahaja objek kecil yang mengeluarkan bunyi yang menarik.
source_text: Fill it with sand, stones, uncooked rice, beans or any small objects that make an interesting sound.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Gerakkan badan anda semasa menggoncangkannya di hadapan bayi anda
source_text: Move your body as you shake it in front of your baby

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Sekiranya selamat, berikannya kepada bayi anda untuk menggoncangnya!
source_text: If it is safe, give it to your baby to shake!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Jadi kreatif! Bolehkah anda cari sesuatu yang berwarna-warni atau mencubanya dengan air?
source_text: Get creative! Can you find something colourful or try it with water?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - Shakers
text: Apakah bunyi yang disukai bayi anda?
source_text: What sounds does your baby like?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Matahari sedang datang ke Sini!
source_text: The Sun is Coming!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Baringkan bayi anda setelah memandikan atau menukar lampinnya
source_text: Lie your baby on their back after washing them or changing their diaper

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Beritahu mereka matahari datang! Gerakkan jari-jari anda seperti sinaran matahari di atas kepala mereka dan jadikan wajah anda satu matahari besar yang sedang tersenyum.
source_text: Tell them the sun is coming! Wiggle your fingers like sunrays above their head and make your face a big smiling sun.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Beritahu mereka angin datang! Tiup lembut ke badan mereka.
source_text: Tell them the wind is coming! Blow softly over their body.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Beritahu mereka hujan datang! Gunakan jari anda untuk menepuk perlahan-lahan seluruh badan mereka seperti titisan air hujan.
source_text: Tell them the rain is coming! Use your fingers to gently pat over their whole body like light raindrops.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Beritahu mereka awan datang! Balut tuala atau kain di sekeliling mereka seperti selimut dan peluk mereka
source_text: Tell them the clouds are coming! Wrap the towel or cloth around them like a blanket and cuddle them

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Bermain dengan cuaca yang berbeza. Mana yang paling disukai bayi anda?
source_text: Play with different weathers. Which one does your baby like best?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Active - The sun is coming
text: Tambahkan kesan bunyi atau jadikannya lagu pendek. Gunakan nada lagu lain yang anda tahu!
source_text: Add sound effects or make it into a little song. Use the tune of another song you know!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Pada Penghujung Hari
source_text: At the End of the Day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Pada setiap penghujung hari, ambil masa seminit untuk berfikir tentang hari tersebut.
source_text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Katakan kepada anak anda tentang satu perkara positif atau menyeronokkan yang mereka telah lakukan.
source_text: Talk your child about one positive or fun thing they did.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Puji diri anda sendiri untuk satu perkara yang anda telah lakukan dengan baik hari ini.
source_text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Fikirkan tentang satu perkara yang anda syukuri.
source_text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Anda adalah bintang!
source_text: You are a star!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Dodoi
source_text: Lullaby

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Semasa bayi atau anak kecil anda menangis, nyanyikan lagu mendayu untuk menenangkan anda berdua
source_text: When your baby or toddler cries, sing a soft song to calm you both down

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Nyanyikan lagu yang menenangkan yang anda tahu atau reka sendiri dengan melodi mudah dan beberapa perkataan yang menenangkan
source_text: Sing a soothing song you know or make up your own with a simple melody and some soothing words

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Ulangi berulang-kali dengan cara berirama. Contohnya, "Anak kecilku, oh anak kecil"
source_text: Repeat it over and over in a rhythmical way. For example, “My little one, oh little one”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Baby - Calm - Lullaby
text: Nyanyikan lagu yang sama dengan kerap sehingga anak anda terbiasa dengannya!
source_text: Sing the same song regularly so your child gets used to it!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Ayam Gila
source_text: Crazy Chicken

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Goyangkan tangan kiri anda ke udara 8 kali sambil mengira sehingga 8
source_text: Shake your left hands in the air 8 times while counting to 8

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Lakukan dengan pantas dan dengan bunyi yang sekuat mungkin
source_text: Do it as fast and loud as you can

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Ulangi dengan tangan anda yang sebelah lagi. Ulangi dengan kedua-dua kaki
source_text: Repeat with your other hand. Repeat with both feet

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Lakukannya 7 kali, kemudian 6 kali dan teruskan sehingga anda tiba pada 1.
source_text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times and continue until you get to 1.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Setiap orang sebutkan "Ayam gila" dan mereka lakukan tarikan ayam gila yang terbaik!
source_text: Everyone calls out “Crazy chicken” and does their best crazy chicken dance!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Koreografi tarian
source_text: Dance choreography

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Buat koreografi tarian untuk lagu kegemaran anak anda
source_text: Create a dance choreography to your children’s favorite songs

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Orang pertama melakukan gerakan tarian dan orang lain tiru sepertinya.
source_text: First person does a dance move and everyone else copies.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Setiap orang bergilir-gilir menjadi ketua
source_text: Everyone takes turns being the leader

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance choreography
text: Lakukannya untuk seisi rumah!
source_text: Perform it for the household!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance party
text: Parti Tari-menari
source_text: Dance Party

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance party
text: Bermain atau menyanyi muzik kegemaran anda dan menari di sekeliling bilik
source_text: Play or sing your favourite music and dance around the room

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance party
text: Menari dengan cara yang berbeza atau dengan anggota tubuh anda yang berlainan
source_text: Dance in different ways or with different parts of your body

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance party
text: Sebagai contoh, "Menari seperti monyet", "Menari seperti ayam" atau "Menari hanya dengan lutut dan pinggul kita"
source_text: For example, “Dance like a monkey”, “Dance like a chicken” or “Dance with just our knees and hips”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance party
text: Fikirkan arahan yang berbeza. Bermain-mainlah dengan serius!
source_text: Think up different instructions. Be seriously playful!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance party
text: Apabila muzik berhenti, setiap orang membekukan diri dengan lucu.
source_text: When the music stops, everyone does a funny freeze.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Dance party
text: Berikan anak anda peluang untuk menjadi salah seorang yang memberhentikan muzik!
source_text: Give your child a chance to be the one to stop the music!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: Tarian kaku
source_text: Freeze dance

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: Mainkan muzik atau seseorang menyanyikan lagu, dan semua orang menari
source_text: Play music or someone sings a song, and everyone dances

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: Apabila muzik berhenti, semua orang mesti berhenti
source_text: When the music stops, everyone must freeze

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: Orang terakhir yang masih menari menjadi hakim untuk pusingan seterusnya
source_text: Last person still dancing becomes the judge for the next round

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Freeze dance
text: Tarian haiwan: Sama seperti di atas tetapi ketika muzik berhenti, sebut nama haiwan, dan semua orang harus menjadi haiwan itu
source_text: Animal dance: Same as above but when the music stops, call out a name of an animal, and everyone has to become that animal

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Jadikan Kerja Rumah Sesuatu yang Menyeronokkan
source_text: Make Housework Fun

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Melakukan kerja rumah bukanlah sesuatu yang menyeronokkan... atau pun mungkin ianya menyeronokkan? Anda boleh menjadikannya satu permainan, seperti ini.
source_text: Household chores aren’t fun… or are they? You can make them into a game, like this.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Sentuh sesuatu berwarna merah.
source_text: Touch something red.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Lompat ke atas dan ke bawah sepuluh kali.
source_text: Jump up and down ten times.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Make housework fun
text: Letak kasut di atas rak kasut.
source_text: Put the shoes in the shoe rack.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Cermin
source_text: Mirror

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Permainan ini boleh dimainkan secara berpasangan ataupun berkumpulan
source_text: This game can be played in pairs or even as a group

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Berdiri menghadap satu sama lain atau dalam bulatan
source_text: Stand facing each other or in a circle

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Seorang akan mendahului sementara yang lain mesti meniru sepertinya, cuba bergerak tepat pada masa yang sama dengan ketua.
source_text: One person leads first while everyone else must copy, trying to move exactly at the same time as the leader.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Pastikan ketua bergerak cukup perlahan supaya boleh diikuti oleh semua orang! Terokai pergerakan bahagian tubuh yang berbeza dan pada tahap yang berbeza.
source_text: Make sure the leader moves slowly enough for everyone to follow! Explore moving different body parts and in different levels.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Selepas seketika, tukar siapa yang menjadi ketua. Beri peluang kepada semua orang untuk memimpin
source_text: After a while, switch who is leading. Give everyone a chance to lead

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Mirror
text: Cuba lakukannya tanpa ketua!
source_text: Try it with no leaders!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Name that tune
text: Namakan lagu itu
source_text: Name that tune

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Name that tune
text: Orang pertama dapat memilih atau menyanyikan satu lagu
source_text: First person gets to choose or sing a song

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Name that tune
text: Orang lain mesti meneka nama lagu tersebut (untuk menjadikannya lebih sukar mereka boleh meneka penyanyinya)
source_text: Everyone else must guess the name of the tune (to make it harder they can guess the singer)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Name that tune
text: Orang yang pertama meneka dengan betul akan menjadi ketua yang seterusnya
source_text: The first one to guess it right becomes the next leader

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Rain on the mountain
text: Hujan di Gunung
source_text: Rain on the Mountain

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Rain on the mountain
text: Sebutkan, "Ada hujan di atas gunung"
source_text: Call out, “There’s rain on the mountain”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Rain on the mountain
text: Semua orang membalas "Lari, lari, lari" sambil berlari di sekeliling kawasan.
source_text: Everyone else replies “Run, run, run” while running around the space.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Rain on the mountain
text: Sebutkan arahan yang berbeza. Sebagai contoh, sentuh sesuatu berwarna merah atau lompat seperti katak
source_text: Call out different instructions. For example, touch something red or hop like a frog

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Rain on the mountain
text: Terus bermain dan ubah arahan setiap masa.
source_text: Keep playing and change the instructions each time.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Rain on the mountain
text: Anda boleh menggunakannya sebagai cara yang menyeronokkan untuk belajar warna atau mengemas!
source_text: You can use this as a fun way to learn colours or even tidy up!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Berlari Keliling dan Lakukan Ini
source_text: Run Around and Do This

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Semua orang berlari keliling bilik atau taman. Pastikan ruangnya cukup besar dan selamat
source_text: Everyone runs around the room or garden.  Make sure the space is large enough and safe

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Pada bila-bila masa, seseorang boleh berhenti di suatu tempat dan berkata, "Apabila kamu sampai di sini, kamu lakukan ini!"
source_text: At any time, someone can stop somewhere and say, “When you get over here, you do this!”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Apa yang anda buat boleh jadi: tekan tubi, menyanyikan lagu, menangis, melompat...
source_text: What you do can be anything: push-ups, singing a song, crying, jumping…

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Semakin banyak anda bermain, semakin banyak perkara yang perlu dilakukan di lebih banyak tempat.
source_text: The more you play, there are more and more things to do in more and more places.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Setiap orang boleh memutuskan hendak pergi ke mana.
source_text: Each person can decide where to go when.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Run around and do this
text: Seronok berinteraksi dengan orang lain yang melakukan perkara yang sama seperti anda!
source_text: It’s fun to interact with other people who are doing the same thing as you!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Lihat dan Jadi seperti itu
source_text: See It Be It

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Lihat sekeliling anda dan namakan sesuatu yang anda boleh nampak. Sebagai contoh, sebatang pokok atau sebuah cawan
source_text: Look around you and name something that you can see. For example, a tree or a cup

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Katakan kepada anak anda "Saya nampak sebatang pokok, mari jadi pokok"
source_text: Say to your child “I see a tree, let’s be it”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Mula dari kiraan 5 dan buat bentuk pokok dengan badan anda. Jadilah sebesar dan selucu mungkin.
source_text: Countdown from 5 and make the shape of a tree with your bodies. Be as big and silly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Sekarang giliran anak anda. Apa yang dapat mereka lihat?
source_text: Now let your child have a turn. What can they see?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Sekiranya boleh, pergi keluar dan berada di alam semula jadi. Sekiranya tidak boleh, mainkan di dalam rumah.
source_text: If you can, go outside and be in nature. If you can’t, play it inside.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - See it be it
text: Apabila anda telah melakukannya beberapa kali, tambahkan gerakan dan bunyi!
source_text: When you’ve done it a few times, add moves and sounds!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: Kapal ke Pantai
source_text: Ship to Shore

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: Permainan aktif yang menyeronokkan di mana kanak-kanak belajar pelbagai bahagian bot. Semua orang mesti pergi ke tempat atau aktiviti yang anda nyatakan
source_text: A fun active game where children learn different parts of a boat. Everyone must go to the place or activity that you call out

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: "Haluan" bermaksud lari ke depan kapal (bilik)
source_text: “Bow” means run to the front of the boat (room)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: "Buritan" bermaksud berlari ke belakang kapal
source_text: “Stern” means run to the back of the boat

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: "Kanan" bermaksud lari ke sebelah kanan dan "Pelabuhan" bermaksud lari ke sebelah kanan
source_text: “Starboard” means run to the right side and “Port” means run to the right side

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: "Panjat tali-temali": berpura-pura memanjat
source_text: “Climb the rigging”: pretend to climb

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: "Bersihkan dek": berpura-pura membersihkan lantai
source_text: “Clean the deck”: pretend to clean the floor

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: "Bot penyelamat, [bilangan] orang!": Pegang tangan dalam bulatan bersama-sama dan melutut
source_text: “Lifeboat, [number] people!”: hold hands in a circle with that many people and do knee bends

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Ship to shore
text: Semua orang yang tidak berada dalam bot penyelamat mesti berenang!
source_text: Everyone not in a lifeboat must swim!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: Arahan Pentas
source_text: Stage Directions

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: Sama seperti Kapal ke Pantai tetapi dengan Arahan Pentas: "Kanan Pentas, Kiri Pentas, Bawah Pentas, Atas Pentas, Tengah Pentas."
source_text: The same as Ship to Shore but with Stage Directions: “Stage Right, Stage Left, Downstage, Upstage, Centre Stage.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: Anda boleh melakukan aksi-aksi yang menyeronokkan seperti "Kematian Dramatik, Tunduk, Buka Tirai, Bersihkan Lantai," dll.
source_text: You can have fun actions like “Dramatic Death, Take a Bow, Open the Curtain, Clean the Floor,” etc.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Stage Directions
text: Selain "Bot penyelamat", anda mewujudkan "Barisan Pelakon". Mereka yang bukan pelakon menjadi pengarah!
source_text: Instead of “Lifeboat” you make “Cast of Actors.” Those not in the cast become the director!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Superpowers
text: Kuasa terhebat
source_text: Superpowers

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Superpowers
text: Fikirkan tentang kuasa terhebat. Sebagai contoh, pergi ke mana sahaja dengan serta-merta, melancong pada masanya, membaca minda.
source_text: Think of a superpower. For example, going anywhere instantly, travelling in time, reading minds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Superpowers
text: Tanya anak anda "Jika kamu mempunyai kuasa terhebat untuk [...] bagaimana anda menggunakannya?
source_text: Ask your child “If you had the superpower to […] how would you use it?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Superpowers
text: Galakkan mereka untuk menamakan adiwira mereka dan lakonkannya.
source_text: Encourage them to give their superhero a name and act it out.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Superpowers
text: Sekarang biarkan mereka pilih kuasa terhebat untuk anda
source_text: Now let them choose a super power for you

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Superpowers
text: Pastikan anda melakonkannya juga!
source_text: Make sure you act it out too!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object
text: Ubah objek
source_text: Transform the object

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object
text: Barang keperluan harian rumah seperti penyapu, mop, atau selendang boleh menjadi alat permainan yang menyeronokkan
source_text: Every day household items like brooms, mops, or scarfs can become fun props for games

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object
text: Letakkan objek di tengah-tengah ruang bilik dan setiap kali seseorang mempunyai idea, mereka melompat masuk dan tunjukkan objek itu boleh dijadikan apa
source_text: Place an object in the center of the room and whenever someone has an idea, they jump in and show the rest what the object can be

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Transform the object
text: Contohnya, penyapu mungkin ditunggang sebagai kuda atau mikrofon atau gitar!
source_text: For example, a broom might be ridden as a horse or a microphone or a guitar!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: Apa Yang Anda Lakukan?
source_text: What Are You Doing?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: Permainan ini adalah yang terbaik apabila terdapat lebih daripada 2 orang pemain
source_text: This game is best when more than 2 people play

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: Seorang berpura-pura sedang melakukan sesuatu - contohnya, menyikat rambut atau menyiapkan makan malam
source_text: One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair or making dinner

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: Seorang lagi bertanya, "Apa yang kamu lakukan?"
source_text: Another person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: Orang pertama perlu mengatakan sesuatu yang tidak ada kaitan dengan menyikat rambut, misalnya, "Mengikat tali kasut saya."
source_text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: Orang kedua kemudian mula berpura-pura mengikat tali kasutnya sehingga orang yang lain pula bertanya, "Apa yang kamu lakukan?"
source_text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - What are you doing
text: Jawapannya mestilah sentiasa sesuatu yang berbeza daripada apa yang sebenarnya anda lakukan!
source_text: The answer must always be something different than what you are actually doing!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Cacing Pulang ke Rumah
source_text: Worms Go Home

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Baring pada perut anda dan jadikan jari telunjuk anda seolah-olah seekor cacing yang bergoyang-goyang.
source_text: Lie on your tummies and pretend your index fingers are a wiggly worm.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Dengan tangan anda yang lain buat rumah cacing dengan membuat bulatan menggunakan jari dan ibu jari anda dan letakkannya pada lantai.
source_text: With your other hand make a worm house by making a circle with your fingers and thumb and place it on the floor.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Sebutkan arahan untuk jari anda sentuh, seperti "Cacing pada hidung" atau "Cacing pada telinga"
source_text: Call out an instruction for your finger to touch, like “Worms on noses” or “Worms on ears”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Apabila anda menyebutkan "Cacing pulang ke rumah", cacing anda yang bergoyang-goyang itu perlu mencari rumah cacing sepantas mana yang boleh.
source_text: When you call out “Worms go home”, your wiggly worm has to find a worm house as quickly as possible.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Cacing yang terakhir menjumpai rumah akan menyebutkan arahan yang seterusnya.
source_text: The last worm to find a home calls out the instructions next.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Active - Worms go home
text: Teruskan bermain hingga anda berasa lebih bertenaga dari berbaring.
source_text: Keep playing until you feel rejuvenated from lying down.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Pada Penghujung Hari
source_text: At the End of the Day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Pada setiap penghujung hari, ambil masa seminit untuk berfikir tentang hari tersebut.
source_text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Katakan kepada anak anda tentang satu perkara positif atau menyeronokkan yang mereka telah lakukan.
source_text: Talk your child about one positive or fun thing they did.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Puji diri anda sendiri untuk satu perkara yang anda telah lakukan dengan baik hari ini.
source_text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Fikirkan tentang satu perkara yang anda syukuri.
source_text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Anda adalah bintang!
source_text: You are a star!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Naga Buta
source_text: Blind Dragon

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Permainan ini bagus jika anda mempunyai sekurang-kurangnya 4 orang
source_text: This game is great if you have at least 4 people

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Ceritakan kisah tentang seekor naga ganas yang tinggal berhampiran sebuah kampung. Dia akan menyelinap ke kampung pada waktu malam dan mencuri harta benda orang - apa sahaja yang mereka sayangi. Sesiapa yang cuba mengambil kembali harta mereka akan dimakan hidup-hidup. Ini berlanjutan selama bertahun-tahun sehingga naga menjadi tua, gemuk, dan buta dengan duduk di atas harta karunnya dan memandang kilauan wang emas. Kemudian penduduk bandar boleh mencuba masuk ke dalam sarangnya dan mencuri balik harta karun saudara mereka.
source_text: Tell the story about a ferocious dragon who lived near a village. He would sneak into the village at night and steal people’s treasures – anything they loved.  Anybody who tried to take their treasure back would be eaten alive.  This continued for many years until the dragon became old, fat, and blind from sitting on his treasure and gazing at the glare of the gold coins. Then the townspeople could try and sneak into his lair and steal back their relatives’ treasure.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Seorang menjadi naga. Naga duduk dengan penutup mata atau mata tertutup dikelilingi oleh timbunan harta karun.
source_text: One person plays the dragon. Dragon sits blindfolded or with eyes closed surrounded by a pile of treasure.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Setiap orang mempunyai satu harta karun yang mereka mesti curi kembali.
source_text: Everyone has one piece of treasure that they must steal back.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Sekiranya naga itu mendengar dan menunjuk ke arah anda, anda mesti kembali ke tempat permulaan.
source_text: If the dragon hears you and points at you, you must go back to the starting place.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Blind Dragon
text: Hanya satu orang yang boleh mendapatkan harta itu pada satu masa.
source_text: Only one person can try to get the treasure at a time.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Dancing with Angels
text: Menari dengan Malaikat
source_text: Dancing with Angels

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Dancing with Angels
text: Aktiviti ini membantu kanak-kanak belajar memimpin. Ia juga membina kepercayaan antara anda dan anak anda
source_text: This activity helps children learn how to lead. It also builds trust between you and your child

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Dancing with Angels
text: Mainkan muzik yang lembut dan santai untuk mendorong pergerakan yang lancar dan menenangkan.
source_text: Play a piece of music that is gentle and relaxed to encourage smooth and calming movement.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Dancing with Angels
text: Seorang mendahului dan menutup mata sementara yang lain adalah malaikat penjaga atau pelindung
source_text: One person goes first and closes their eyes while the other person is the guardian angel or protector

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Dancing with Angels
text: Malaikat penjaga mesti melindungi orang yang matanya tertutup dari bahaya sambil menari bersama dengan lembut
source_text: The guardian angel must protect the person with their eyes closed from harm while gently dancing together

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Dancing with Angels
text: Apabila muzik berakhir, penari boleh membuka mata sebelum mereka bertukar peranan
source_text: When the music ends, the dancer can open their eyes before switching roles

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Melukis
source_text: Drawing

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Kanak-kanak gemar melukis! Ia membantu membentuk kreativiti
source_text: Children love to draw! It helps build creativity

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Dapatkan beberapa batang pen atau krayon dan sekeping kertas atau kadbod
source_text: Get some pens or crayons and a piece of paper or cardboard

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Biarkan anak anda bebas dalam apa sahaja yang mereka mahukan
source_text: Let your children freely whatever they want

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Semasa anak anda sedang melukis, gunakan perkataan untuk menggambarkan apa yang sedang mereka lakukan: "Saya nampak kamu sedang melukis orang" atau "Saya nampak kamu sedang membuat garisan dengan krayon berwarna merah."
source_text: While your child is drawing, use words to describe what they are doing: “I see you are drawing a person” or “I see you are making lines with the red crayon.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Anda juga boleh berseronok melukis di sebelah mereka
source_text: You can also have fun drawing next to them

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Drawing
text: Letakkan lukisan mereka pada dinding, peti sejuk, atau di luar untuk menghias rumah - ia akan membuatkan anak anda rasa dihargai!
source_text: Put their drawings up on the wall, refrigerator, or outside to decorate the house – it will make your children feel appreciated!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Mendengar pada Bunyi
source_text: Listening to Sounds

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Duduk dan pejamkan mata anda
source_text: Sit down and close your eyes

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Berapa banyak bunyi yang anda boleh dengar? Dengar bunyi di dalam dan di luar bilik. Kira dengan jari anda
source_text: How many sounds can you hear? Listen to the sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Selepas 10 saat, berapa banyak jari yang anda naikkan? Apakah bunyi yang anda dengar?
source_text: After ten seconds, how many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Cuba lagi untuk 10 saat.
source_text: Try again for another ten seconds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Bolehkah anda dengar sebarang bunyi yang baru? Bolehkah anda dengar sebarang bunyi di dalam badan anda sendiri?
source_text: Can you hear any new sounds? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Listening to sounds
text: Kenal pasti bagaimana perasaan anda dan tanyakan kepada anak anda bagaimana perasaan mereka.
source_text: Notice how you feel and ask your child how they are feeling.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Memory game
text: Permainan memori - "Apabila COVID-19 berakhir..."
source_text: Memory game – “When COVID-19 ends…”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Memory game
text: Orang pertama berkata, "Apabila COVID-19 berakhir, saya akan... (cth., pergi ke taman)"
source_text: First person says, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to… (e.g., go to the park)”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Memory game
text: Orang kedua menambah kepada orang pertama, "Apabila COVID-19 berakhir, saya akan pergi ke taman dan... (cth., menziarahi sahabat saya"
source_text: Second person adds to first person, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to the park and… (e.g., visit my best friend”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Memory game
text: Setiap orang yang menambah kepada orang yang sebelumnya cuba memikirkan semua perkara yang menyeronokkan apabila COVID-19 berakhir
source_text: Each person adds to the previous trying to think of all of the fun things to do when COVID-19 ends

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Potret Kendiri
source_text: Self-portrait

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Inilah cara anak anda dapat melukis gambar diri mereka sendiri!
source_text: Here’s how your children can draw a picture of themselves!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Cari sekeping kertas atau kadbod besar. Panjangnya sama atau lebih sedikit daripada ketinggian anak anda
source_text: Find a big piece of paper or cardboard. It needs to be the same length or slightly longer than the height of your child

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Minta anak anda berbaring di atas kertas. Lukiskan garis besar anak anda dengan teliti.
source_text: Ask your child to lie down on the paper. Carefully draw the outline of your child.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Sekarang biarkan anak anda mengisi garis besar itu: wajah, rambut, pakaian, kasut, atau apa sahaja yang mereka mahukan!
source_text: Now let your child fill in the outline: face, hair, clothes, shoes, or anything they want!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Minta anak anda melukis perkara yang mereka suka dan tidak suka di luar garis besar itu
source_text: Ask your child to draw things that they like and do not like outside of the outline

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Berbual dengan anak anda mengenai perkara-perkara ini. Anda mungkin belajar sesuatu tentang anak anda!
source_text: Have a conversation with your child about these things. You may learn something about your child!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Self portrait
text: Anda boleh meletakkan garis besar mereka di bilik mereka atau di mana-mana sahaja di rumah - ini akan membuatkan anak-anak anda berasa dihargai!
source_text: You can put their outline up in their room or anywhere in the house – it will make your children feel appreciated!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time
text: Masa bercerita
source_text: Story time

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time
text: Mulakan cerita dengan "Pada suatu masa dahulu terdapat..."
source_text: Start the story with “Once upon a time there was a…”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time
text: Biarkan anak anda membentuk ayat yang seterusnya
source_text: Let your child make up the next sentence

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time
text: Kemudian anda bentukkan satu ayat
source_text: Then you make up a sentence

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time
text: Ambil giliran sehingga anda mendapat satu cerita baru yang menyeronokkan
source_text: Take turns until you have a wonderful new story

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time
text: Pastikan untuk mengakhiri cerita dengan sesuatu yang positif.
source_text: Make sure to end the story on a positive note.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Story time
text: Tanya anak anda apakah bahagian cerita yang paling mereka gemari!
source_text: Ask your child what was their favourite part of the story!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Pengganggu
source_text: The Interrupter

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Pilih pencerita untuk mula mereka cerita
source_text: Choose a storyteller to start making up a story

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Pendengar cerita boleh mengganggu dengan sepatah perkataan pada bila-bila masa
source_text: Story listeners can interrupt with a word at any time

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Pencerita perlu memasukkan perkataan itu dalam cerita mereka
source_text: Storyteller needs to fit that word in their story

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Cuba dengan pencerita yang berbeza!
source_text: Try with a different storyteller!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Three options
text: Tiga pilihan
source_text: Three options

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Three options
text: Fikiran tiga situasi berbeza. Sebagai contoh, memandu kereta, belayar dengan bot atau memandu kapal terbang
source_text: Think of three different situations. For example, driving a car, sailing a boat or flying a plane

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Three options
text: Katakannya kepada anak anda dan tanyakan, "Manakah yang kamu lebih suka?"
source_text: Say them to your child and ask, “Which would you prefer?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Three options
text: Tanya mereka mengapa?
source_text: Ask them why?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - Three options
text: Sekarang fikirkan tiga lagi situasi atau minta anak anda melakukannya untuk anda
source_text: Now think of three more situations or ask your child to do it for you

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - When I was younger
text: Ketika Saya Masih Kecil
source_text: When I Was Younger

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - When I was younger
text: Kanak-kanak suka mendengar cerita mengenai kehidupan anda sendiri!
source_text: Children love to hear stories about your own life!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - When I was younger
text: Fikirkan masa ketika anda masih muda apabila sesuatu yang BESAR terjadi kepada anda
source_text: Think of a time when you were younger when something BIG happened to you

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - When I was younger
text: Ia boleh jadi pengembaraan, kenangan gembira, atau cabaran yang anda alami
source_text: It can be an adventure, happy memory, or challenge that you experienced

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Child - Calm - When I was younger
text: Kongsikan dengan anak anda dan perhatikan bagaimana mereka mendengar!
source_text: Share it with your child and notice how they listen!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Tukang masak bersama
source_text: Co-chef

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Tanya kepada anak remaja anda jenis makanan yang mereka suka makan.
source_text: Ask your teen what kind of meal they would like to eat.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Sediakannya bersama-sama! Untuk kali pertama, anda mungkin perlu bimbing mereka.
source_text: Prepare it together! The first time, you may need to guide them.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Apabila anak anda sudah tahu menyediakan makanan, biarkan mereka memimpin dan ikuti arahan mereka.
source_text: Once your teen knows how to prepare the meal, let them take the lead and follow their instructions.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Biarkan setiap anak dan remaja dalam rumah mempunyai giliran untuk menjadi ketua tukang masak.
source_text: Let each child and teen in the house have a turn at being the head chef.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Co chef
text: Anda boleh juga membantu mereka menyediakan bajet untuk bahan masakan!
source_text: You can even help them make a budget for ingredients!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Ayam Gila
source_text: Crazy Chicken

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Goyangkan tangan kiri anda ke udara 8 kali sambil mengira sehingga 8
source_text: Shake your left hands in the air 8 times while counting to 8

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Lakukan dengan pantas dan dengan bunyi yang sekuat mungkin
source_text: Do it as fast and loud as you can

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Ulangi dengan tangan anda yang sebelah lagi. Ulangi dengan kedua-dua kaki
source_text: Repeat with your other hand. Repeat with both feet

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Lakukannya 7 kali, kemudian 6 kali dan teruskan sehingga anda tiba pada 1.
source_text: Do it 7 times, then 6 times and continue until you get to 1.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Crazy chicken
text: Setiap orang sebutkan "Ayam gila" dan mereka lakukan tarikan ayam gila yang terbaik!
source_text: Everyone calls out “Crazy chicken” and does their best crazy chicken dance!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Dance Choreography
text: Koreografi tarian
source_text: Dance choreography

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Dance Choreography
text: Cipta satu koreografi tarian untuk satu lagu kesukaan remaja anda
source_text: Create a dance choreography to your teen's favorite songs

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Dance Choreography
text: Orang pertama melakukan gerakan tarian dan orang lain tiru sepertinya.
source_text: First person does a dance move and everyone else copies.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Dance Choreography
text: Setiap orang bergilir-gilir menjadi ketua
source_text: Everyone takes turns being the leader

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Dance Choreography
text: Lakukannya untuk seisi rumah!
source_text: Perform it for the household!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Get Active
text: Cergas!
source_text: Get active!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Get Active
text: Tampilkan tiga jenis senaman bersama-sama. Sebagai contoh, berjalan, joging, bermain bola atau menari
source_text: Come up with three types of exercise together. For example, walking, jogging, soccer or dancing

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Get Active
text: Pilih satu dan cuba bersama-sama.
source_text: Pick one together and try it out.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Get Active
text: Jika anda berdua menyukainya, buat keputusan berapa kerap anda akan melakukannya. Sekali atau dua kali seminggu? Setiap pagi?
source_text: If you both like it, decide how often you are going to do it. Once or twice a week? Every morning?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Get Active
text: Fikir cara untuk melakukannya bersama-sama dengan lebih seronok. Bolehkah anda joging untuk satu titik tertentu? Ambil giliran untuk menjadi jurulatih? Beri galakkan dengan sedikit ganjaran kecil?
source_text: Together think of ways to make it even more fun. Can you jog to a certain point? Take turns in being the coach? Motivate each other with a small free reward?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Jadikan Kerja Rumah Sesuatu yang Menyeronokkan
source_text: Make Housework Fun

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Melakukan kerja rumah bukanlah sesuatu yang menyeronokkan... atau pun mungkin ianya menyeronokkan? Anda boleh menjadikannya satu permainan, seperti ini.
source_text: Household chores aren’t fun… or are they? You can make them into a game, like this.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Sentuh sesuatu berwarna merah.
source_text: Touch something red.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Lompat ke atas dan ke bawah sepuluh kali.
source_text: Jump up and down ten times.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Ada api di atas gunung! Lari, lari, lari!
source_text: There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Make housework fun
text: Letak kasut di atas rak kasut.
source_text: Put the shoes in the shoe rack.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Name that tune
text: Namakan lagu itu
source_text: Name that tune

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Name that tune
text: Orang pertama dapat memilih atau menyanyikan satu lagu
source_text: First person gets to choose or sing a song

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Name that tune
text: Orang lain mesti meneka nama lagu tersebut (untuk menjadikannya lebih sukar mereka boleh meneka penyanyinya)
source_text: Everyone else must guess the name of the tune (to make it harder they can guess the singer)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Name that tune
text: Orang yang pertama meneka dengan betul akan menjadi ketua yang seterusnya
source_text: The first one to guess it right becomes the next leader

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Petikan Jari
source_text: Pass the Snap

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Permainan ini seronok dengan sekurang-kurangnya 3 orang
source_text: This game is best with at least 3 people

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Mulakan dalam bulatan dan petik satu jari dalam bulatan (atau tepuk jika tidak dapat memetik jari)
source_text: Start in a circle and pass one snap around the circle (or clap if you cannot snap)

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Anda petik sekali untuk melontar kepada seseorang menangkapnya. Lihat kepada orang yang anda baling itu.
source_text: You snap once to throw the snap and once to catch it. Look at the person you are throwing to.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Arah tersebut (atas, bawah, lurus, melengkung, berguling di tanah) dan kekuatan (keras, lembut, sederhana) yang anda baling snap memberi kesan bagaimana individu tersebut menangkapnya.
source_text: The direction (up, down, straight, curved, rolling the ground) and force (hard, soft, medium) that you throw the snap should affect how the person catches it.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Anda boleh lantun petikan, baling ke udara, dan tangkap beberapa kali sebelum melepaskannya.
source_text: You can bounce the snap, throw it in the air, and catch it a few times before passing it.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Apabila semua orang telah pandai, anda boleh mulakan langkah mengelilingi bilik, dalam keadaan memetik jari.
source_text: When everyone gets good at this, you can start moving around the room, still passing the snap.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - Pass the snap
text: Adakah anda boleh melemparkan di bawah kaki? Ke belakang? Melalui kepala? Memintas petikan? Berseronok dengan petikan!
source_text: Can you throw under the leg?  Behind the back?  Through your head?  Intercept a pass? Have fun with the snap!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: Apa Yang Anda Lakukan?
source_text: What Are You Doing?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: Permainan ini adalah yang terbaik apabila terdapat lebih daripada 2 orang pemain
source_text: This game is best when more than 2 people play

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: Seorang berpura-pura sedang melakukan sesuatu - contohnya, menyikat rambut atau menyiapkan makan malam
source_text: One person pretends to be doing something – for example, combing hair or making dinner

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: Seorang lagi bertanya, "Apa yang kamu lakukan?"
source_text: Another person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: Orang pertama perlu mengatakan sesuatu yang tidak ada kaitan dengan menyikat rambut, misalnya, "Mengikat tali kasut saya."
source_text: The first person needs to say something that has nothing to do with combing hair, for example, “Tying my shoes.”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: Orang kedua kemudian mula berpura-pura mengikat tali kasutnya sehingga orang yang lain pula bertanya, "Apa yang kamu lakukan?"
source_text: The second person then starts pretending to tie their shoes until a new person asks, “What are you doing?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What are you doing
text: Jawapannya mestilah sentiasa sesuatu yang berbeza daripada apa yang sebenarnya anda lakukan!
source_text: The answer must always be something different than what you are actually doing!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What is new
text: Apa yang terbaru?
source_text: What’s new?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What is new
text: Fikirkan satu kemahiran yang anda boleh pelajari bersama anak remaja. Sebagai contoh, menjaga bola di udara atau kaki, berseloroh, belajar satu bahasa baharu, atau bermain alat permainan?
source_text: Think of a new skill you could learn together with your teen. For example, keeping a ball in the air or your foot, juggling, learning a new language, or playing an instrument?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What is new
text: Ambil giliran untuk mencuba kemahiran baharu.
source_text: Take turns in trying the new skill out.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Active - What is new
text: Pastikan untuk memuji satu sama lain, dan cuba untuk belajar dan bermain bersama!
source_text: Make sure to praise each other, and try to learn and play together!
