flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: 2 Benar, 1 Salah
source_text: 2 Truths, 1 Lie

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Fikir tiga pernyataan tentang diri anda. Dua mesti benar dan satu yang salah.
source_text: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Itu mungkin membantu untuk berfikir tentang harapan, impian, pengalaman di sekolah, apa yang disukai atau dibenci. Sebagai contoh, saya benci pisang, subjek kesukaan saya adalah sains, dan saya sangat berharap yang saya boleh menyanyi.
source_text: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, experiences at school, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, my favourite subject is science, and I really wish I could sing.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Katakan kepada anak remaja anda. Tanya mereka untuk meneka yang mana satu adalah bohong.
source_text: Say them to your teenager. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Adakah mereka meneka dengan betul? Adakah ia sesuatu yang mengejutkan?
source_text: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - 2 Truths 1 Lie
text: Sekarang minta mereka melakukan perkara yang sama. Adakah anda belajar sesuatu yang baru antara satu sama lain?
source_text: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Pada Penghujung Hari
source_text: At the End of the Day

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Pada setiap penghujung hari, ambil masa seminit untuk berfikir tentang hari tersebut.
source_text: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Katakan kepada anak anda tentang satu perkara positif atau menyeronokkan yang mereka telah lakukan.
source_text: Talk your child about one positive or fun thing they did.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Puji diri anda sendiri untuk satu perkara yang anda telah lakukan dengan baik hari ini.
source_text: Praise yourself for one thing you did well today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Fikirkan tentang satu perkara yang anda syukuri.
source_text: Think of one thing that you are grateful for.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - At the end of the day
text: Anda adalah bintang!
source_text: You are a star!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Dream travel
text: Kembara Impian
source_text: Dream Travel

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Dream travel
text: Anda tidak boleh mengembara tetapi boleh berangan! Tanya soalan-soalan ini kepada anak remaja anda
source_text: You can’t travel but you can dream! Ask your teen these questions

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Dream travel
text: Ke mana kamu mahu mengembara? Berapa lama kamu akan pergi? Apa yang kamu akan bawa bersama? Apa yang kamu akan lakukan? Apa yang kamu akan lihat?
source_text: Where do you want to travel? How long will you be away? What will you pack? What will you do? What will you see ?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Dream travel
text: Lihat peta bersama-sama jika ada.
source_text: Look at a map together if you have one.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Dream travel
text: Pilih satu negara yang tidak pernah didengari dan lihat bersama-sama secara dalam talian.
source_text: Choose a country that they’ve never heard of and look it up together online.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - How was your day
text: Bagaimana hari anda?
source_text: How was your day?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - How was your day
text: Tanya satu sama lain, "Apa yang membuatkan kamu gembira hari ini?"
source_text: Ask each other, “What made you happy today?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - How was your day
text: Tanya satu sama lain, "Adakah hari ini sukar?"
source_text: Ask each other, “What was difficult today?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - How was your day
text: Tanya satu sama lain. "Bagaimana kami boleh bantu kamu?"
source_text: Ask each other, “How can we help you?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - How was your day
text: Cuba lakukannya bersama-sama setiap hari, ketika anda makan atau sebelum tidur
source_text: Try to do this together every day, when you are eating together or before bed

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: Hanya bersembang mesra
source_text: Just a friendly chat

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: Mulakan perbualan dengan anak remaja anda mengenai sesuatu yang mereka suka
source_text: Have a conversation with your teen about something they like

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: Ia boleh jadi apa sahaja mereka pilih untuk bercakap: sukan, kawan-kawan, muzik, selebriti...
source_text: It can be about anything they choose to talk about: sports, friends, music, celebrities…

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Just a friendly chat
text: Cuba dengar anak remaja anda dan beri mereka ruang untuk bercakap
source_text: Try to listen to your teen and give them space to talk

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Reka satu cerita!
source_text: Make up a story!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Mulakan cerita dengan "Pada suatu masa dahulu terdapat..."
source_text: Start the story with “Once upon a time there was a…”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Biarkan anak remaja anda membuat ayat seterusnya
source_text: Let your teen make up the next sentence

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Kemudian anda bentukkan satu ayat
source_text: Then you make up a sentence

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Ambil giliran sehingga anda mendapat satu cerita baru yang menyeronokkan
source_text: Take turns until you have a wonderful new story

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Pastikan untuk mengakhiri cerita dengan sesuatu yang positif.
source_text: Make sure to end the story on a positive note.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Make up a story
text: Tanya kepada anak remaja anda bahagian manakah yang menjadi kesukaan mereka!
source_text: Ask your teen what was their favourite part of the story!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Mirror
text: Cermin
source_text: Mirror

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Mirror
text: Permainan ini boleh dimainkan secara berpasangan ataupun berkumpulan
source_text: This game can be played in pairs or even as a group

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Mirror
text: Berdiri menghadap satu sama lain atau dalam bulatan
source_text: Stand facing each other or in a circle

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Mirror
text: Seorang akan mendahului sementara yang lain mesti meniru sepertinya, cuba bergerak tepat pada masa yang sama dengan ketua.
source_text: One person leads first while everyone else must copy, trying to move exactly at the same time as the leader.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Mirror
text: Pastikan ketua bergerak cukup perlahan supaya boleh diikuti oleh semua orang! Terokai pergerakan bahagian tubuh yang berbeza dan pada tahap yang berbeza.
source_text: Make sure the leader moves slowly enough for everyone to follow! Explore moving different body parts and in different levels.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Mirror
text: Selepas seketika, tukar siapa yang menjadi ketua. Beri peluang kepada semua orang untuk memimpin
source_text: After a while, switch who is leading. Give everyone a chance to lead

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Mirror
text: Cuba lakukannya tanpa ketua!
source_text: Try it with no leaders!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Kuasa terhebat
source_text: Superpowers

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Fikirkan tentang kuasa terhebat. Sebagai contoh, pergi ke mana sahaja dengan serta-merta, melancong pada masanya, membaca minda.
source_text: Think of a superpower. For example, going anywhere instantly, travelling in time, reading minds.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Tanya kepada anak remaja anda "Jika kamu mempunyai kuasa ajaib [...] bagaimana kamu akan menggunakannya"?
source_text: Ask your teen “If you had the superpower to […] how would you use it?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Galakkan mereka untuk menamakan adiwira mereka dan lakonkannya.
source_text: Encourage them to give their superhero a name and act it out.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Sekarang biarkan mereka pilih kuasa terhebat untuk anda
source_text: Now let them choose a super power for you

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Superpowers
text: Pastikan anda melakonkannya juga!
source_text: Make sure you act it out too!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Pengganggu
source_text: The Interrupter

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Pilih pencerita untuk mula mereka cerita
source_text: Choose a storyteller to start making up a story

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Pendengar cerita boleh mengganggu dengan sepatah perkataan pada bila-bila masa
source_text: Story listeners can interrupt with a word at any time

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Pencerita perlu memasukkan perkataan itu dalam cerita mereka
source_text: Storyteller needs to fit that word in their story

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - The Interrupter
text: Cuba dengan pencerita yang berbeza!
source_text: Try with a different storyteller!

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Tiga pilihan
source_text: Three options

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Fikiran tiga situasi berbeza. Sebagai contoh, memandu kereta, belayar dengan bot atau memandu kapal terbang
source_text: Think of three different situations. For example, driving a car, sailing a boat or flying a plane

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Katakan kepada anak remaja dan tanya. "Awak lebih suka yang mana?"
source_text: Say them to your teen and ask, “Which would you prefer?”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Tanya mereka mengapa?
source_text: Ask them why?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Three options
text: Sekarang fikirkan tiga lagi situasi atau minta anak anda melakukannya untuk anda
source_text: Now think of three more situations or ask your child to do it for you

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - When COVID19 ends
text: Permainan memori - "Apabila COVID-19 berakhir..."
source_text: Memory game – “When COVID-19 ends…”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - When COVID19 ends
text: Orang pertama berkata, "Apabila COVID-19 berakhir, saya akan... (cth., pergi ke taman)"
source_text: First person says, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to… (e.g., go to the park)”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - When COVID19 ends
text: Orang kedua menambah kepada orang pertama, "Apabila COVID-19 berakhir, saya akan pergi ke taman dan... (cth., menziarahi sahabat saya"
source_text: Second person adds to first person, “When COVID-19 ends, I am going to the park and… (e.g., visit my best friend”

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - When COVID19 ends
text: Setiap orang yang menambah kepada orang yang sebelumnya cuba memikirkan semua perkara yang menyeronokkan apabila COVID-19 berakhir
source_text: Each person adds to the previous trying to think of all of the fun things to do when COVID-19 ends

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: Ya, Tidak atau Mungkin
source_text: Yes, No or Maybe

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: Bertanya kepada satu sama lain. Mungkin soalan berkaitan apa yang anda suka atau apa yang anda buat hari ini.
source_text: Ask each other questions. They can be any questions about things you like or what you did today.

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: Peraturannya adalah anda tidak boleh menjawab Ya, Tidak atau Mungkin
source_text: The only rule is that you can’t answer Yes, No or Maybe

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: Berapa lama anda boleh bertahan? Seberapa kreatifkah anda dengan jawapan anda?
source_text: How long can you last? How creative can you get with your answers?

flow_name: PLH - Activity - Teen - Calm - Yes No or Maybe
text: Tukar dan main lagi!
source_text: Swap over and play again!
